${ModID}:BonesOut.NAME: Bones Out
${ModID}:BonesOut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals 9 or more unblocked damage, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BuryTheLight.NAME: Bury the Light
${ModID}:BuryTheLight.DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${ModID}:Shadow, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} , otherwise enter Succubus:Shadow.

${ModID}:FireBolt.NAME: Fire Bolt
${ModID}:FireBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in ${ModID}:Flame, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${ModID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted. NL Enter ${ModID}:Flame.

${ModID}:Jettison.NAME: Jettison
${ModID}:Jettison.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard up to !M! cards.

${ModID}:LightTheTorch.NAME: Light the Torch
${ModID}:LightTheTorch.DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${ModID}:Flame, draw !M! cards, otherwise enter Succubus:Flame.

${ModID}:Malice.NAME: Malice
${ModID}:Malice.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you are in ${ModID}:Shadow, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ModestFinale.NAME: Modest Finale
${ModID}:ModestFinale.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no other cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have other cards in my hand.

${ModID}:NullCard.NAME: Null
${ModID}:NullCard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exit your Stance. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Phantasm.NAME: Phantasm
${ModID}:Phantasm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:PrecisionStrike.NAME: Precision Strike
${ModID}:PrecisionStrike.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Deal damage equal to !D! times its cost.

${ModID}:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
${ModID}:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL While held, cards will not Exhaust on play.

${ModID}:Sedate.NAME: Sedate
${ModID}:Sedate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ShadeSpirit.NAME: Shade Spirit
${ModID}:ShadeSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Enter ${ModID}:Shadow. NL If the enemy intends to Attack, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:SoulSeeker.NAME: Soul Seeker
${ModID}:SoulSeeker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} . NL Enter Succubus:Shadow.

${ModID}:Supplies.NAME: Supplies
${ModID}:Supplies.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL If this card is Exhausted, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:SwiftImpact.NAME: Swift Impact
${ModID}:SwiftImpact.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in a Stance, exit it and deal double damage.

${ModID}:TwinClaw.NAME: Twin Claw
${ModID}:TwinClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.
